text: Signe Toly Anderson (September 15, 1941 - January 28, 2016) was an American singer. She was one of the founding members of the American rock band Jefferson Airplane. Anderson was born in Seattle, Washington. Anderson died from complications of COPD at her home in Beaverton, Oregon. She was aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jefferson Airplane | Fillmore Auditorium | San Francisco, CA | Oct 15, 1966 | Late Show - concertvault.com * Got a Revolution!: The Turbulent Flight of Jefferson Airplane, Jeff Tamarkin, Atria, 2005, * Jefferson Airplane website Category:1941 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from COPD Category:Jefferson Airplane members Category:Singers from Seattle
title: Signe Toly Anderson
